Html:
Hi Ohan,

Any clue, idea, or intention to go markerless on this toolkit?

 

Thank for your sharing.

Truyen

It depends on whether there is an easy-to-integrate markerless tracking library that is not GPL and also whether we have time and need to integrate it. Currently, the question is no, so if you really need one, you need to integrate one yourself. The integration should be similar to any of the marker-based libraries.

Ohan
